mapper.select:
SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.email, m.nickname, m.phone_number AS phoneNumber, m.my_team_code AS myTeamCode, (SELECT name_kr FROM teams WHERE team_code = m.my_team_code) AS myTeamName, m.status, m.created_at AS createdAt, m.social_provider AS socialProvider,
-- 1. 직관 횟수 (이번달) (SELECT COUNT(d.diary_id) FROM diaries d JOIN games g ON d.game_id = g.game_id WHERE d.member_id = m.member_id AND d.is_verified = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') AND d.status = 'COMPLETED') AS monthlyAttendanceCount,
-- 2. 팔로잉 수 (내가 팔로우하는 사람) (SELECT COUNT(f.follow_id) FROM follows f WHERE f.follower_id = m.member_id) AS followingCount,
-- 3. 팔로워 수 (나를 팔로우하는 사람) (SELECT COUNT(f.follow_id) FROM follows f WHERE f.following_id = m.member_id) AS followerCount,
-- 4. 승률 예측 전적 (맞추면 1승, 틀리면 1패) (SELECT COUNT(prediction_id) FROM predictions WHERE member_id = m.member_id AND is_correct = 1) AS winCount, (SELECT COUNT(prediction_id) FROM predictions WHERE member_id = m.member_id AND is_correct = 0) AS loseCount, 0 AS drawCount
FROM members m
